title: 观看我们的万圣节直播！大量诡异的ADD-ONS！
author: 混乱
txt_content:
观看我们的万圣节直播！大量诡异的ADD-ONS！
（直播已经结束了，不过可以看到录像）

Ghosts and ghoulies, zombies and freaks - Halloween is the night that they shudder from the shadows to work mischief upon the living! Our own Twitch channel was possessed by numerous sinister spooklets for a two-hour long livestream, summoned forth by the utterance of such ancient and terrible names as Marc, Jason, Helen and Mike.
鬼魂和低语，僵尸和怪物 —— 万圣节是他们在阴影颤抖的夜晚进行的恶作剧！我们的Twitch是由无数恶鬼附体的一个两小时长的直播，通过这样的话语传唤古老而可怕的名字的马克，杰森，海伦和麦克。
After performing the dark and diabolical rites to get the microphone working, they proceeded to play through a special House of Horrors map, haunted by creepy custom mobs - all made using Add-Ons!
执行黑暗恶魔仪式拿到话筒后，他们继续通过恐怖地图，进入有定制怪物出没的一个恐怖房间 - 全部使用ADD-ONS制作！
Watch the team encounter these ghastly and grim creations on our Twitch channel or download the map and Add-Ons for yourself! Get everything you need right here. Just click the import button in-game (next to Create New World), locate the House of Horrors file, and it should set everything up for you. Spookily simple.
一起观看我们的恶作剧和冷酷发明Twitch 或者下载地图和ADD-ONS自己玩！获取你需要在这里的一切。只需在游戏中点击导入按钮（创建新的世界旁），找到恐怖房子的文件，它已经为你设置好一切。诡异而简单。
Cheerio！Marsh- @marshdavies

replies.author: 一周一个
replies.txt_content: orz 来个中文字幕的录像吧~
